nodes.text: Following the end of the Swarm War, microdroid wrestling became a popular sport in many casinos. Hobbyists built microdroids to act as miniature gladiators. In each round, two droid combatants fought and the winner moved onto the next round. The actual combat took place in a secure chamber so that spectators were not accidentally injured by the droids.
The Maw Casino on the Errant Venture hosted microdroid wrestling matches, one of which was fought on an artificial battlefield made to resemble Kashyyyk.
